summary: A man lives in parallel worlds, falling in love with the same woman, while the police hunt down a serial killer who steals brains.
cast: Tilda Swinton|Tom McCamus|Sean McCann|Gabriel Gascon|Rick Miller|Griffith Brewer|Daniel Brooks|Steve Adams|Russell Yuen|Mariah Inger|Laurent Imbault|Lisa Bronwyn Moore|Eric Hoziel|Simon Lee|Clément Cormier|Sylvie Rousseau|Fanny Gobrysz Forget|Etienne Gobrysz Forget|Bertrand Cyr|Denis Cormier|Dean Hagopian|Jessica Paré|Ian Watson|Anthony McCrae|Lynne Adams|Claudia Alfaro|Ryan Hollyman
title: Possible Worlds
